title: Data model & types
description: Create internal/model/todo.go with Todo struct, Status enum (pending/in_progress/done), CreateTodoRequest, UpdateTodoRequest (pointer fields for partial updates), TodoListResponse, ErrorResponse. Include swaggo struct tags.

title: Project scaffolding: go.mod, .gitignore, directory structure
description: Initialize Go module (todo-service), create .gitignore (data/*.db*, logs/*.log*, todo-service binary), create data/.gitkeep and logs/.gitkeep directories
